info.title: Web Search
info.description: API for Tavily search and extract endpoints.

post.description: Execute a search query using Tavily Search.

query.description: The search query to execute with Tavily.

search_depth.description: The depth of the search. A 'basic' search costs 1 credit while 'advanced' costs 2 credits.

max_results.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

time_range.description: The time range back from the current date to filter results.

days.description: Number of days back from the current date to include. Available only if topic is 'news'.

include_answer.description: Include an LLM-generated answer to the provided query.

include_raw_content.description: Include the cleaned and parsed HTML content of each search result.

include_images.description: Also perform an image search and include the results in the response.

include_image_descriptions.description: When include_images is true, also add a descriptive text for each image.

include_domains.description: A list of domains to specifically include in the search results.

exclude_domains.description: A list of domains to specifically exclude from the search results.

response_time.description: Time in seconds it took to complete the request.

post.description: Extract web page content from one or more specified URLs using Tavily Extract.

urls.description: The URL or list of URLs to extract content from.

include_images.description: Include a list of images extracted from the URLs in the response.

extract_depth.description: The depth of the extraction process.

response_time.description: Time in seconds it took to complete the request.

info.title: URL Content Reader
info.description: Fetches the text content from a personal website.

get.description: Retrieves the contents of a specified URL and converts it to LLM-friendly Markdown format.

parameters.name: target_url
parameters.description: The URL of the content to be read.

schema.description: The content of the URL converted to LLM-friendly Markdown format.

get.summary: Read the contents of a URL and convert to Markdown

info.title: Arxiv Search
info.description: Run Arxiv search and get the article information.

get.description: Run Arxiv search and get the article information.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: same as the search_query parameter rules of the arxiv API.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: the index of the first returned result.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: the number of results returned by the query.
